name: Name Your Game
description:
Name Your Game is a simple game that you can personalize to share with someone. Click on the flying targets to display personal messages. Pick the colors, choose from over 300 targets, write your messages, and even change the title to whatever you like. Just click the button in the lower-right corner to change it however you seem fit. 

In future updates, I hope to include:

- Ability to send an instance of the personalized game via link to the recipient.

- Ability to upload photos and use them as targets.

All donations will go towards future versions and updates.
